message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product.  Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $14,500. I'm open to discussing this further, so let me know your thoughts.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
Bob, thanks for your interest.  While $12,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $13,500. I believe this reflects the true value of the product. What do you think?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. However, I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $13,000?
